actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Lawrence R. Machado.

summary.text: Deems a specified affliction of a named individual to be a service-connected disability for purposes of compensation for service-connected disability and death. Declares any amounts payable under this Act to be in full satisfaction of any claim against the United States that such individual may have for service-connected disability compensation relating to the above mentioned disability.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Lawrence R. Machado.
